title: Fontshop Germany - New Website
content:
hi folks,

finally. fontshop germany will release their new website in a few days. so was it worth the wait? i don’t think so, myfonts.com is way ahead.

look yourself: [http://beta.fontshop.de/](http://web.archive.org/web/20090528111344/http:/beta.fontshop.de/ "http://beta.fontshop.de/")

fontshop will release a new font family for just 10 €, too. look for the font Axel on their beta website.

have fun :)
author: betablogger
